# docker Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "docker" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String) The Docker daemon address
- `timeout` (Number) The timeout for Docker API requests

					Default: 30 seconds
